title: Can't connect to servers
body: I just dced from PVP.net and my internet is completely fine (which is why I am able to post this). Is this a server issue?

replies.body: Would you mind running the OCE network diagnostics tool and also letting me know who your ISP is?

And Earlier i got mad DC that wasnt my end. As soon as it happened i checked to see if anything else was using the net and nothing was, i had assumed it was a steam update but that came the Annie game and was easily sorted.

This was around 8:20am This morning.
Then i got this one halfway through the game.

i wish i was allowed to post more than one screenshot per post...

But yeah i got this message prior to loading into a game about 4 seconds before it started.
